label: Nicephorion
Name: الرافضة
details: According to Wikiepdia, "Between 771 and 772, the Abbasid caliph al-Mansur built a garrison city about 200 metres to the west of al-Raqqah for a detachment of his Khorasanian Persian army. It was named al-Rāfiqah, "the companion". The strength of the Abbasid imperial military is still visible in the impressive city wall of al-Rāfiqah. Al-Raqqah and al-Rāfiqah merged into one urban complex, together larger than the former Umayyad capital Damascus." They are still recorded as separate entities in the Muqaddimah
